top_comments.comment: So many good DIY projects 👏♥ I really liked the mason jars and napkins holder!

I loved all of these! The paper wreath in a slightly larger scale would also make a great advent calendar. Just punch a hole in the top of the round part and the flappy top part of each cone, feed some thread through the holes, fill the cone with a piece of candy and tie the thread. Then write the numbers on the closed "lids" with a marker.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I love them all ❣Thank you for sharing ❣🥰❤
Love finding such great-priced decor!! And what an amazing PLANNER!
Hi i loved them all.so lovely.loved french horn best.but the little.book stack was so.sweet.the.jars.so.cute.x

mystyle would be to    keep the lg wooden bowl just as you have it but for each holiday add some seasonal colored pick berries. orange /brown for fall. red/green Christmas then white for winter months. mint /mauve spring. blue/white summer.
